projects.title: Wrapsy
projects.desc: An E-commerce gift store built with React.js with all the required features from searching, filtering and sorting products to adding them to a cart, setting quantities and so on.

projects.title: Dropy
projects.desc: Dropy is built using React and HTML5 Drag and Drop API. It lets developers add Drag & Drop feature into their projects with ease.

projects.title: Spot
projects.desc: Spot is a geolocation bookmark app that lets you mark your favourite spots on the map as you visit them and let you save them incase if you decide to visit them later.
